jobDescription: Job Title: Data ScientistLocation: Dallas, TXDuration: 12+ monthJob Responsibilities:Analysis, design, architecture, development and support various Data Science Tools and applications like R, RStudio, Python, Jupyter Notebooks, Anaconda, etc.Work with key business partners and Data Scientists to prioritize modeling initiatives, manage timeline expectations, and ensure that technical solutions meet business needs.Possess knowledge and show demonstrable capability of working in a Big Data EnvironmentBe capable of working in a big data environment, processing large volumes of data efficiently and using this data for Analytical Modeling.Support the design, development, roll-out of analytical solutionsWork hand in hand with Data Scientists and Data EngineersSupport custom solutions built using various technologies such as R, Scala, PythonFor more contact details:Pavanpponthagani@9to9soft.com203-678-8000 * 215- provided by Dice  Data Scientist, R, RStudio, Python, Jupyter, Notebooks, Anaconda
